---
category: news
title: "Prediction of the functional impact of missense variants in BRCA1 and BRCA2 with BRCA-ML"
excerpt: "In silico predictions of missense variants is an important consideration when interpreting variants of uncertain significance (VUS) in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes. We trained and evaluated hundreds of machine learning algorithms based on results from validated functional assays to better predict missense variants in these genes as damaging or neutral."
publishedDateTime: 2020-04-29T09:41:00Z
webUrl: "https://www.nature.com/articles/s41523-020-0159-x"
